## Next Meeting

The next Meeting will be on November 14th 2024 at the University of Essen in room [R12
R06 A48](#location). In the session we will talk about the paper<a href = "paper/Rambachan_timeseries_causal_nonparametric.pdf" download="Rambachan_timeseries_causal_nonparametric.pdf">When Do Common Time Series Estimands Have Nonparametric Causal Meaning?</a>. Christian Schulz will start the session with a small presentation (around 20 minutes) to introduce the topic for the later discussion.
